# rlR: Reinforcement learning in R

## Installation
```{r}
devtools::install_github("compstat-lmu/rlR", dependencies = TRUE)
```

## Usage
```{r}
library(rlR)
env = makeGymEnv("CartPole-v0")
listAvailAgent()
```


```{r}
agent = makeAgent("AgentDQN", env)
system.time({
perf = agent$learn(1000)
})
perf$plot()
```
